title: Skerryvore
summary: Skerryvore (from the Gaelic An Sgeir Mh√≤r meaning "The Great Skerry") is a remote island that lies off the west coast of Scotland, 12 miles (19 kilometres) south-west of the island of Tiree. Skerryvore Lighthouse is located on these rocks, built with some difficulty between 1838 and 1844 by Alan Stevenson.[4]
